verses.verse: To you I do lift <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> you who <S%H3427>sit<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens.<s%>

<S%H5869>Behold,<s%> as the eyes of <S%H5650>servants<s%> look to the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H113>master,<s%> as the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of a <S%H8198>maid<s%> to the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of her <S%H1404>mistress;<s%> so our <S%H5869>eyes<s%> look to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> until he has mercy on <S%H2603>us.<s%>
Have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> on <S%H3068>us,<s%> Yahweh, have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> on <S%H7227>us,<s%> for we have endured <S%H7646>much<s%> <S%H937>contempt.<s%>
Our <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H7227>exceedingly<s%> <S%H7646>filled<s%> with the <S%H3933>scoffing<s%> of those who are at <S%H7600>ease,<s%> with the <S%H937>contempt<s%> of the <S%H1343>proud.<s%>
